notes: The cooldown triggers upon attack begin, not upon attack launch or hit.
If two sources of critical strike proc at the same time, the higher multiplier has priority.
Does not work against wards, buildings, and allied units.
abilities.description: Empowers your next attack, causing it to be a critical strike dealing 130% damage.

name: Imp Claw
description: Though their tasks are largely thankless, demon hunters can often turn a profit bartering parts in Weeping Rose.
